key.name: auto-keyboard-backlight
key.description: When enabled, the extension will automatically control the keyboard backlight based on ambient light conditions. The keyboard backlight will be enabled in low light conditions and disabled in brighter environments.

key.name: brightness-bias-ratio
key.description: Global multiplier applied to all automatic brightness levels. Values below 1.0 make the screen dimmer, values above 1.0 make it brighter. This value is learned from manual brightness adjustments and can be manually overridden in preferences.
